resources.string: Are you sure you want to quit\?
Are you sure you want to reset all ratings\?

Welcome to speech recordings rating using visual analog scales application.

 This application was developed for use in research and development in the department of circuit theory, faculty of electrotechnics, CTU in Prague.

 You can begin the rating process by listening to the first audio recording, after you confirm this window.

Error! No audio files found in the designated data folder in the application directory. Place your audio speech recordings saved as MP3-files in the application directory on an external SD card inserted in your device. This is required as internal device storage tends to be limited in capacity.

 Folder structure has to be following:
 "app-root"/files/"group-folder"/
 where "app-root" is the application root directory - typically:
 "your-phone"/Card/Android/data/com.petrkryze.vas/
 and "group-folder" has to be "HC", "DBS_OFF" or "DBS_130". Then, place the corresponding audio-files into these folders.

 Currently supporting only this predefined system, will be upgraded to auto-recognize group names in the future versions.
This function is not yet implemented.
